exercises.title: Array Basics
exercises.description: Learn fundamental array operations and manipulation techniques.

tasks.title: Find Maximum Element
tasks.question:
Write a function that finds the maximum element in an array.

Your function should:

  • Accept an array of integers as input
  • Find the largest number in the array
  • Return the maximum value
  • Handle edge cases like empty arrays
tasks.hint: Use a loop to compare each element with the current maximum

tasks.title: Array Indexing
tasks.question:
What is the index of the first element in an array?

Consider this array: [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]
options: It depends on the programming language

tasks.title: Array Sum
tasks.question:
Write a function that calculates the sum of all elements in an array.

Your function should:

  • Accept an array of numbers as input
  • Add all elements together
  • Return the total sum
  • Handle empty arrays by returning 0
tasks.hint: Use a loop to accumulate the sum or use built-in sum function

exercises.title: String Fundamentals
exercises.description: Master basic string operations and manipulation techniques.

tasks.title: String Length
tasks.question:
Write a function that finds the length of a string without using built-in length methods.

Your function should:

  • Accept a string as input
  • Count the number of characters
  • Return the length
  • Handle empty strings
tasks.hint: Use a loop to count characters one by one

tasks.title: String Case Conversion
tasks.question:
Write a function that converts a string to uppercase and lowercase.

Your function should:

  • Accept a string as input
  • Convert to uppercase
  • Convert to lowercase
  • Return both versions
tasks.hint: Use built-in toUpperCase() and toLowerCase() methods
